PlaneGCS source:
- Repo: https://github.com/FreeCAD/FreeCAD
- Commit: 3f49f3f05958c4a8f4c5b470adfebbc1503b3f45
- Path: src/Mod/Sketcher/App/planegcs

Local adjustments:
- Added stub headers to remove FreeCAD-specific dependencies:
  - `third_party/planegcs/SketcherGlobal.h`: provides export/visibility macros expected by PlaneGCS.
  - `third_party/planegcs/FCConfig.h`: placeholder for FreeCAD config macros (empty stub in OneCAD).
  - `third_party/planegcs/Base/Console.h`: minimal Base::Console logging shim.
  Rationale: PlaneGCS expects FreeCAD headers; these stubs keep the library standalone.
  Follow-up: replace with OneCAD shared config/logging or upstream a dependency-free variant.
- Added `third_party/planegcs/boost_graph_adjacency_list.hpp` wrapper to centralize the Boost
  adjacency_list include (keeps include paths consistent and allows future Boost-version shims).
- Updated includes in Geo.h, GCS.h, Constraints.h to use local SketcherGlobal.h.
- Added System configuration setters in GCS.h/GCS.cpp for solver tuning without touching fields:
  - `void System::setConvergence(double tol)` (default 1e-10)
  - `void System::setMaxIterations(int maxIterIn)` (default 100)
  - `void System::setConvergenceRedundant(double tol)` (default 1e-10)
  - `void System::setMaxIterationsRedundant(int maxIterIn)` (default 100)
  These are additive; use the setters in OneCAD (prefer over direct field mutation).
